ygData.subject: Re: Werewolves
ygData.msgSnippet: In a message dated 7/8/99 3:18:02 AM Eastern Daylight Time, EQCheats@onelist.com writes:
ygData.messageBody:
In a message dated 7/8/99 3:18:02 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
EQCheats@onelist.com writes:

<< Date: Thu, 8 Jul 1999 01:40:38 -0000
From: "Remlin" <remlin@...>
Subject: Re: WnS

they are in Kithicor Forest

Later
Chris

-----Original Message-----
From: Whitcraft,David <DWHITCRAFT@...>
To: 'EQCheats@onelist.com' <EQCheats@onelist.com>
Date: Wednesday, July 07, 1999 2:33 PM
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] WnS


>From: "Whitcraft,David" <DWHITCRAFT@...>
>
>What area are werewolves in? I've seen one and heard of someone fighting
one
>other in West Commons. Any other areas? Also, about what level are they?
>I've heard about 18-20th. >>

Werewolves are found in Kith Forest, West Commons, West Karana, and
Mistmoore. Most start at about 22nd, though the Mist ones I have HEARD start
at around 28 (unconfirmed). The one I have seen in West Commons was red to me
when I tracked it down at 20th a while back, so the random factor of spawns
may also have some effect.
